game.name: The Joy of Putting
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Sports, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: Relive the era of Flash mini-golf games on more than 54 holes based on real courses! And do it... for The Joy of Putting!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relive the era of Flash mini-golf games on more than 54 holes based on real courses! And do it... for The Joy of Putting!
